title: Gmae crashses and goes through files and then crashes again.
body: So the game pretty much crashed, then closed and then it (automatically) looked through the game files to see what happened and why it crashed. Once it went  through the files it, re-opened the game and the game started loading. I get pumped even though I was level 1. Then is crashes before getting into game (on the loading screen). So i let it scan through the files (again it was automatic). Then it does that 1 more time so i thought there was come code that broken or something so i closed the game and decided to restart the laptop that i play on. After coming back I see I have a "leave buster" and im annoyed because I dont deserve the damn time to wait before queue if it wasnt my fault that the game crashed multiple times. I'm really frustrated.

replies.body:
Sorry for the late reply.

Try running a **client repair** through settings (the gear icon top right) > Initiate Full Repair. Go into a custom and check it works.

If it doesn't try **reinstalling the game** with the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends).

If that still doesn't fix your issue **submit a ticket** to [Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they should be able to help you further.
